channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8304834] Fix wrapper insertion in TestScaffold.parseArgs(String args[])
item.description: It is a partial fix of JDK-8289546 which only fix arguments handling.
item.summary: Fix wrapper insertion in TestScaffold.parseArgs(String args[])

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
